game.title: The Missing Shipment
game.objective: Find the missing shipment of weapons.
game.description: A shipment of weapons has gone missing en route to the local militia. The quest-giver asks you to investigate and find the missing shipment.
game.reward: A new weapon and a sum of gold.

task.objective: Talk to Captain Garrison to get more information.
task.description: Visit Captain Garrison at the militia headquarters and talk to him about the missing shipment.

task.objective: Investigate the warehouse where the shipment was last seen.
task.description: Head to the warehouse where the shipment was last seen and look for clues.

task.objective: Track down the bandits who attacked the shipment.
task.description: Follow the clues to find the bandits' hideout and defeat them.

task.objective: Retrieve the missing shipment from the bandits.
task.description: Once you have defeated the bandits, search their hideout for the missing shipment.

task.objective: Return the shipment to Captain Garrison.
task.description: Take the missing shipment back to Captain Garrison at the militia headquarters.
